mapper.sql: SELECT BR.BR_NO, M.USER_NO, M.USER_NNAME, BR.BR_ISBN, BR.BR_PRESENT_PIC, BR.BR_TITLE, BR.BR_CREATE_DATE, BR.BR_MODIFY_DATE, BR.BR_BOOKTYPE, BR.BR_CONTENT, BR.BR_VIEWCOUNT, BR.BR_LIKE, BR.BR_STATUS, BR.BR_RATING FROM BOOK_REVIEW_BOARD BR JOIN MEMBER M ON(BR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE BR.BR_STATUS='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_REVIEW_BOARD WHERE BR_STATUS='Y'
SELECT BR_ISBN, COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_REVIEW_BOARD GROUP BY BR_ISBN ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT BR_ISBN, COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT BR_ISBN, to_char(BR_CREATE_DATE, 'mm' ) AS BR_CREATE_DATE FROM BOOK_REVIEW_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(BR_CREATE_DATE, 'mm' ) = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'mm')) GROUP BY BR_ISBN ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT BR_ISBN, COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT BR_ISBN, to_char(BR_CREATE_DATE, 'mm' ) AS BR_CREATE_DATE FROM BOOK_REVIEW_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(BR_CREATE_DATE, 'mm' ) = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'mm')) GROUP BY BR_ISBN ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
